name: Chicken Curry
instructions: 1. Heat oil in a pan and saut√© onions until golden.
2. Add ginger garlic paste and cook for 2 minutes.
3. Add chicken and cook until browned.
4. Add tomatoes, turmeric, chili powder, and garam masala.
5. Add water and simmer for 30 minutes.
6. Serve hot with rice or naan.

name: Pork Kottu
instructions: 1. Cook pork with soy sauce and curry powder.
2. Add onions, green pepper, and cook until softened.
3. Add kottu roti and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
4. Crack eggs into the mixture and stir until cooked.
5. Serve hot.

name: Chicken Biriyani
instructions: 1. Marinate chicken with yogurt, biriyani masala, and saffron.
2. Cook basmati rice and set aside.
3. In a pot, layer rice, chicken, and fried onions.
4. Cook on low heat for 30 minutes.
5. Serve hot with raita.

name: Mac and Cheese
instructions: 1. Boil macaroni and set aside.
2. In a pan, melt butter and add flour to make a roux.
3. Slowly add milk and stir until thickened.
4. Add cheese, mustard, and salt.
5. Combine sauce with macaroni and bake for 15 minutes.
6. Serve hot.
